annotations.title: Page Header
annotations.note: Contains personalized greeting, search bar, and quick action buttons. Greeting updates based on time of day.

annotations.title: Recent Projects
annotations.note: Shows last 5 accessed projects. Cards include project name, last activity, and quick action menu. Click opens project in new tab.

annotations.title: Quick Actions
annotations.note: Configurable shortcuts to frequently used features. Maximum of 6 items. Users can customize via settings.
